name: Get Portfolio Summary Test
description: Test case for retrieving portfolio summary through agent interaction

parts.text: Give me a summary of my portfolio performance.

Here's a summary of your simulated portfolio performance for account UITESTER01:

**Portfolio Summary:**

*   **Total Value:** $*
*   **Cash Balance:** $*
*   **Invested Value:** $*
*   **Daily Profit & Loss (P&L):** $* (*%)
*   **Total Profit & Loss (P&L):** $* (*%)

This information is for a simulated paper trading account and does not involve real money.
